oyasumi-punpun.title: Goodnight Punpun
oyasumi-punpun.author: Inio Asano
oyasumi-punpun.synopsis: Follows the life of a young boy nicknamed Punpun, as he copes with his dysfunctional family, love life, friends, life goals and hyperactive mind.

monster.title: Monster
monster.author: Naoki Urasawa
monster.synopsis: A brilliant neurosurgeon's life is ruined when he chooses to save a young boy's life instead of operating on the town mayor.

homunculus.title: Homunculus
homunculus.author: Hideo Yamamoto
homunculus.synopsis: A homeless man agrees to participate in a medical experiment where a hole is drilled into his skull, giving him the ability to see people's psychological issues.

aku-no-hana.title: The Flowers of Evil
aku-no-hana.author: Shuzo Oshimi
aku-no-hana.synopsis: A middle school student's life is changed forever when a classmate catches him stealing the gym clothes of the girl he has a crush on.

happiness.title: Happiness
happiness.author: Shuzo Oshimi
happiness.synopsis: A bullied high school student is attacked by a girl who turns him into a vampire, changing his life forever.

berserk.title: Berserk
berserk.author: Kentaro Miura
berserk.synopsis: A former mercenary, now known as the 'Black Swordsman,' seeks revenge against his former leader who sacrificed his comrades for power.

vagabond.title: Vagabond
vagabond.author: Takehiko Inoue
vagabond.synopsis: A fictionalized account of the life of Japanese swordsman Miyamoto Musashi, based on the novel 'Musashi' by Eiji Yoshikawa.

vinland-saga.title: Vinland Saga
vinland-saga.author: Makoto Yukimura
vinland-saga.synopsis: A young Viking seeks revenge against his father's killer while experiencing the harsh reality of being a warrior in a brutal world.

kingdom.title: Kingdom
kingdom.author: Yasuhisa Hara
kingdom.synopsis: During China's Warring States period, a young orphan dreams of becoming a great general and uniting China.

blade-of-the-immortal.title: Blade of the Immortal
blade-of-the-immortal.author: Hiroaki Samura
blade-of-the-immortal.synopsis: An immortal samurai helps a young girl avenge her parents, who were murdered by a group of master swordsmen.

innocent.title: Innocent
innocent.author: Shinichi Sakamoto
innocent.synopsis: The story of Charles-Henri Sanson, who served as the royal executioner in France during the reign of King Louis XVI and the French Revolution.

otoyomegatari.title: A Bride's Story
otoyomegatari.author: Kaoru Mori
otoyomegatari.synopsis: Set in 19th century Central Asia, the story follows a young woman who becomes the bride of a twelve-year-old boy.

blame.title: BLAME!
blame.author: Tsutomu Nihei
blame.synopsis: In a vast and complex technological world known as 'The City', a solitary figure navigates through an endless labyrinth.

dorohedoro.title: Dorohedoro
dorohedoro.author: Q Hayashida
dorohedoro.synopsis: In a city of sorcerers and their victims, a reptilian-headed amnesiac searches for his true identity.

yokohama-kaidashi-kikou.title: Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou
yokohama-kaidashi-kikou.author: Hitoshi Ashinano
yokohama-kaidashi-kikou.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, an android runs a cafe and explores the quiet, beautiful countryside.

yotsuba.title: Yotsuba&!
yotsuba.author: Kiyohiko Azuma
yotsuba.synopsis: The everyday adventures of an energetic, curious young girl named Yotsuba as she learns about the world around her.

barakamon.title: Barakamon
barakamon.author: Satsuki Yoshino
barakamon.synopsis: A young calligrapher is exiled to a rural island where he learns to appreciate the simple things in life.

march-comes-in-like-a-lion.title: March Comes in Like a Lion
march-comes-in-like-a-lion.author: Chica Umino
march-comes-in-like-a-lion.synopsis: A young professional shogi player deals with depression and finds a new family in three sisters who take him in.

solanin.title: Solanin
solanin.author: Inio Asano
solanin.synopsis: A young woman and her boyfriend struggle with adult life, work, and their dreams in modern Japan.

goodnight-punpun.title: Goodnight Punpun
goodnight-punpun.author: Inio Asano
goodnight-punpun.synopsis: Follows the life of a young boy nicknamed Punpun, as he copes with his dysfunctional family, love life, friends, life goals and hyperactive mind.

uzumaki.title: Uzumaki
uzumaki.author: Junji Ito
uzumaki.synopsis: A town is cursed by a supernatural spiral pattern that slowly drives its residents insane.

the-flowers-of-evil.title: The Flowers of Evil
the-flowers-of-evil.author: Shuzo Oshimi
the-flowers-of-evil.synopsis: A middle school student's life is changed forever when a classmate catches him stealing the gym clothes of the girl he has a crush on.

helter-skelter.title: Helter Skelter
helter-skelter.author: Kyoko Okazaki
helter-skelter.synopsis: A famous model who underwent extensive plastic surgery begins to physically and mentally unravel as her body rejects the procedures.

nijigahara-holograph.title: Nijigahara Holograph
nijigahara-holograph.author: Inio Asano
nijigahara-holograph.synopsis: A complex, non-linear story that spans multiple time periods, exploring the aftermath of a tragic event at a local school and its impact on the community."chool and its impact on the community.
